content: I show you my stuff with DM Scotty hey there guys before I show you my new
ballista designs I want to show you a little modification I did in the front
of the crossbow so you can see I used some pieces of wood here to channel the
bolt so wouldn't it would stay on the crossbow better and basically I just use
those bamboo Forks that I used in the original construction so if you're
unfamiliar with that go back and check my or key crossbows hey guys we have a
nice crenelated fortification here with a couple crossbows let me show you the
first design here this one I was going for like an Elvish design I like really
like those wings up from a plastic ring and you can see the bolt won't fall out
easily because of the modification I have some stuff on the wheels have a
lift on the back a stop on the back and paint that kind of a golden color and
there we go that's a nice kind of elvish design there then I have this other
design which I want to do a crossbow that could like kind of rotate so I did
like a base with a washer and it's on a like a small thin Bowl and you can see
the bolt won't easily fall out on this one either
and nice nice I got the little crank in the back and everything so there we go I
think those designs came out pretty cool there's a couple other different designs
you can use for the crossbow the basic crossbow design just change it up a bit
